actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to provide an incentive to small businesses to establish and maintain qualified pension plans by allowing a credit against income taxes for contributions to, and start-up costs of, the plan.
short_title: Small Employer Pension Start-up Incentive Act

summary.text: Small Employer Pension Start-up Incentive Act - Amends the Internal Revenue Code to provide a five-year contribution credit and a three-year start-up cost credit for qualifying small employer pension plans.

titles.title: Small Employer Pension Start-up Incentive Act

A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to provide an incentive to small businesses to establish and maintain qualified pension plans by allowing a credit against income taxes for contributions to, and start-up costs of, the plan.
